grammary.title: Strong adjectives
grammary.content: tiny = very small delicious = very tasty furious = very angry terrifies = very frightened, very scare, very affraid exhausted = very tired boiling = very hot starving = very hungry enormous = very big freezing = very cold filthy = very dirty great = very good awful = very bad
